alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 7:18PM CDT until June 25 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Minnesota, including the following county, Polk. * WHEN...Until 115 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 715 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported street flooding in poor drainage areas within the city of Fosston. Heavy rain has occurred across this area from thunderstorms. There are radar estimates of 2 to 3 inches within the southeastern portion of Polk county. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fosston.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
